moves.1... c5: I always play c5 from e4
moves.2. Nf3 d6 3. d3: I thought he would play d4. Very interesting.
moves.6. Be2 Nc6 7. O-O O-O: Its very good to castle early in the game.
moves.8. Bg5 Bg4 9. h3 Bxf3 10. Bxf3 Qa5: getting my queen out. that's something NOT to do in early game.
moves.12. a3: I think this was to prevent Qb4
moves.12... Nd4: you want to keep your knight in the center of the board for as long as you can!
moves.15. Qxf3 Bxb2 16. Rab1 h5: If white takes on b2 then I get his rook on e1.
moves.20. Nc7 Rec8 21. Nxa8 Rxa8 22. e5 Bxe5 2: I drop another rook!!! this is terrible!
moves.23... Kg7 24. Qxa7: THIS IS EVEN MORE TERRIBLE, HUGE MISTAKE BY WHITE!!
moves.25... Bxb2 26. g4 Be5: trying not to let his king out.
this move is so I can check him on a2 and hope fully get checkmate in there somewhere. My opponent resigned here.
